description:
CCleaner for PC helps you clean up your Windows computer, optimize performance, and maintain your online privacy.

Inject instant speed into your machine by freezing resource-hogging apps and programs and by removing the unnecessary files taking up room on your hard drive. Clear out errors, broken settings, and update drivers to improve stability. Protect your privacy by securely erasing tracking cookies and history.
Taking the hassle out of PC maintenance
Shutdown after Custom Clean  - You can now automatically shut down your PC after a Custom Clean finishes. Find this option in Custom Clean advanced settings.
Easier license activation - We've added a Paste button to the license activation screen, so entering your license key is quicker and simpler.

Helping you to keep your PC running fast and smooth
Faster scans - We've fine-tuned our scanning engine, so Health Check and Custom Clean scans now run noticeably faster.
Update status confirmation - You'll now see a clear "You're up-to-date" message when you check for updates and your app is already on the latest version.

Simplifying the app
Better layout on all screen sizes - The app now adapts more smoothly to different window sizes for a cleaner, more consistent look.
Tidier interface throughout - We've polished up a few visual details, including button alignment, menu visibility, scrollbar spacing, and layout consistency across languages.

Fixing bugs
Firefox history now cleans properly - Your Firefox browsing history is now fully removed during Health Check and Custom Clean scans.
Smoother experience on all Windows devices - We've improved compatibility so that manual updates, scheduled tasks, and Startup Manager work reliably across all supported Windows devices.
Scheduled cleans now respect your exclusions - Files and folders you've added to your exclusion list are now properly preserved during scheduled cleans.
Software Uninstaller displays results correctly - The Software Uninstaller no longer shows a blank screen after completing a scan, you'll see your results as expected.
